sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons protéger l'environnement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must protect the environment.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yào duì zìjǐ yǒu zìxìn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois avoir confiance en toi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should have confidence in yourself.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin de chercher des documents.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to look up some information.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons économiser les ressources naturelles.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should conserve natural resources.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhuīqiú gāo pǐnzhì de shēnghuó.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il recherche une vie de haute qualité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He pursues a high-quality life.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zì xiǎo jiù hěn cōngming.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est intelligent depuis son enfance.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has been smart since childhood.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce dispositif est très avancé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This device is very advanced.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En tant qu'étudiant, il faut étudier dur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: As a student, you should study hard.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le Premier ministre a prononcé un discours important.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The Prime Minister gave an important speech.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le président a visité ce pays.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The president visited this country.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bref, nous devons continuer à faire des efforts.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In short, we must continue to work hard.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuìchū wǒ bú tài lǐjiě tā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Au début, je ne le comprenais pas très bien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: At first, I didn't quite understand him.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们无法阻止这件事发生。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen wúfǎ zǔzhǐ zhè jiàn shì fāshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous ne pouvons pas empêcher cela de se produire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We cannot prevent this from happening.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette route est fermée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This road is closed.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il ouvre la bouche pour parler.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He opens his mouth to speak.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng xiě xià nǐ de diànhuà shùzì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez écrire votre numéro de téléphone.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please write down your phone number.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ néng cāi chū dá'àn ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Peux-tu deviner la réponse ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Can you guess the answer?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gàosu wǒ zhèngquè de fāngxiàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez m'indiquer la bonne direction.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please tell me the right direction.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè zhìlì yóuxì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un jeu d'intelligence.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an intelligence game.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le journaliste l'interviewe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The reporter is interviewing him.
